data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 42,800 people living in the state of Luwero.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Luwero, Uganda
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 14,188 believers in the state of Luwero the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 42,800 people living in Luwero.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Luwero. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Gujarati people. Make the Gujarati people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Over 16.91 percent of the people of Luwero are far from Jesus.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Luwero, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Luwero, Uganda has a population of 42,800.

We estimate Luwero has 14,188 people who might know Jesus, 21,373 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,239 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 14,188 believers in Luwero, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Luwero
